name: SEO Optimizer
description: Automatically optimize SEO metadata and structured data when layout or page files are modified

actions.prompt:
Review and optimize the SEO implementation for this Brokeranalysis platform file:

1. Check metadata completeness (title, description, keywords)
2. Validate Open Graph tags for social sharing
3. Ensure Twitter Card implementation
4. Review structured data (JSON-LD) for broker/financial services
5. Verify canonical URLs and sitemap references
6. Check for broker-specific SEO opportunities
7. Ensure mobile-friendly meta tags
8. Validate accessibility attributes

Focus on broker comparison and financial services SEO best practices. Make suggestions for improvements without breaking existing functionality.
